attributes.action: Change the amount of the daily allowance of a refugee!
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to raise the daily allowance for a refugees as £5.36 is not enough to survive on ,this reduces the quality of life with  someone who is in this position inevitably restricting them from other opportunities available due to not being able to afford anything but necessities to live.
attributes.background: I want the government to raise the daily allowance for refugee from £5.36 to £8.50 this will allow more stress relief due to financial reasons pressurising refugees from the thought of survival, every day. It’s inhumane The conditions refugees are forced to live in with no other choice.
